trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> is a visual object that can be used to render vector graphics on the screen.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> 是可用于在屏幕上呈现矢量图形的视觉对象。

trans-unit.source: The content is persisted by the system.
trans-unit.target: 内容由系统保留。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> is a lightweight drawing class that is used to render shapes, images, or text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> 是用于呈现形状、 图像或文本的轻量绘制类。

trans-unit.source: This class is considered lightweight because it does not provide layout, input, focus, or event handling, which improves its performance.
trans-unit.target: 此类是被视为轻量，因为它不提供布局、 输入、 焦点或事件处理中，这将提高其性能。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art.
trans-unit.target: 因此，绘图非常适用于背景和剪贴画。

trans-unit.source: In order to use <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> objects, you need to create a host container for the objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>你需要创建主机容器对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: The host container object must be derived from the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> class, which provides the layout and event handling support that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> class does not support.
trans-unit.target: 主机容器对象必须源自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>类，该类提供的布局和事件处理支持<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>类不支持。

trans-unit.source: The host container object does not display any visual properties, since its main purpose is to contain child objects.
trans-unit.target: 主机容器对象不显示任何可视属性，因为其主要用途是以包含子对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using DrawingVisual Objects](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/using-drawingvisual-objects.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 DrawingVisual 对象](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/using-drawingvisual-objects.md)。

trans-unit.source: For a complete example showing how to create <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> objects with a host container, see the [Hit Test Using DrawingVisuals Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159994) .
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>对象与主机容器，请参阅[命中测试使用 DrawingVisuals 示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159994)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> object, it has no drawing content.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>对象，它不包含任何绘制内容。

trans-unit.source: You can add text, graphic, or image content by retrieving the drawing context of the object and drawing into it.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过检索对象的绘图上下文，并在其中绘制添加文本、 图形或映像内容。

trans-unit.source: A drawing context is returned by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual.RenderOpen%2A> method of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> object.
trans-unit.target: 绘制上下文返回通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual.RenderOpen%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>对象。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> object is created, and a rectangle is drawn into its drawing context.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>创建对象时，控件，矩形绘制到它的绘图上下文。

trans-unit.source: Notice that you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> to persist drawing content.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>将绘制内容保留。

trans-unit.source: Gets the drawing content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> 对象的绘图内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> that represents the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup" /> 类型的值，该值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A visual object stores its rendering data as a vector graphics instruction list.
trans-unit.target: 视觉对象将其呈现的数据存储为向量图形指令列表。

trans-unit.source: Each item in the instruction list represents a low-level set of graphics data in a serialized format.
trans-unit.target: 指令列表中的每一项表示一组低级别图形中的数据序列化格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how visual objects store graphics data, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何将视觉对象的详细信息将图形数据存储，请参阅[WPF 图形呈现概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Any change to the returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> value is not persisted by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.
trans-unit.target: 对返回的任何更改<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>值不会通过保存<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> value of each <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> in a host visual is enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>每个值<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>visual 枚举宿主中。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual.HitTestCore" /> determines whether the bounds of the visual object has been hit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual.HitTestCore" /> 确定是否已命中可视对象的边界。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" /> that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> to hit test against.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters" /> 类型的值，指定命中测试所依据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a geometry value is within the bounds of the visual object.
trans-unit.target: 确定可视对象的边界中是否存在几何图形值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters" /> that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to hit test against.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters" /> 类型的值，指定命中测试所依据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a point coordinate value is within the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> 对象的边界中是否存在点坐标值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" />, representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> returned from a hit test.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" /> 类型的值，表示从命中测试中返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A> property of the return value represents the visual object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit%2A>属性的返回值表示命中的视觉对象。

trans-unit.source: Opens the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> object for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 打开用于呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The returned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> value can be used to render into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 值可用于呈现为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual" />。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>, the current drawing content replaces any previous drawing content defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>、 绘图为定义的任何先前的绘制内容的内容将替换当前<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>。

trans-unit.source: This means that there is no way to append new drawing content to existing drawing content.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着将没有办法将新的绘制内容追加到现有的绘制内容。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual> object is created, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> returned.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>创建对象，并将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>返回。

trans-unit.source: The order in which you draw into the drawing context is important—each succeeding drawing is drawn on top of the others.
trans-unit.target: 你绘图上下文中绘制的顺序非常重要 — 每个后续绘图绘制在其他之上。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the rectangle is drawn first, then the text.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，在该矩形是绘制第一个，则文本。
